paper_abstract: In this paper, we give the fermionic p-adic integral representation of q-Bernstein polynomials associated with q-Genocchi numbers and polynomials. And we construct some interesting properties of q-Bernstein polynomials associated with q-Genocchi numbers and polynomials.
paper_title: q-BERNSTEIN POLYNOMIALS ASSOCIATED WITH q-GENOCCHI NUMBERS AND POLYNOMIALS
